TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IToolboxService

summary.span: 提供方法和屬性，以管理和查詢開發環境中的 [工具箱]。

span.span: Provides methods and properties to manage and query the toolbox in the development environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面提供新增及移除工具箱項目和工具箱建立者的屬性和方法回呼委派，序列化和還原序列化的工具箱項目，並擷取 [工具箱] 的狀態資訊和管理 [工具箱] 狀態。The interface provides properties and methods for adding and removing toolbox items and toolbox creator callback delegates, serializing and deserializing toolbox items, and retrieving toolbox state information and managing toolbox state. 您可以使用下列方法來擷取工具箱 的內容的相關資訊：You can retrieve information about the contents of the toolbox with the following methods: - 屬性會指出在工具箱上目前可用的類別。The property indicates the categories currently available on the toolbox. - 屬性會指出目前選取的工具箱分類。The property indicates the currently selected toolbox category. - 方法會擷取在 [工具箱] 中，選擇性地篩選所指定的工具箱分類項目。The method retrieves the items on the toolbox, optionally filtered by a specified toolbox category. - 方法會擷取目前所選。The method retrieves the currently selected . - 方法會選取指定為目前的工具箱項目。The method selects the specified as the current toolbox item. - 方法會指示是否指定序列化物件，如果它是，支援指定的設計工具主應用程式，或是否符合指定的屬性。The method indicates whether the specified serialized object, if it is a , is supported by the specified designer host, or whether it matches the specified attributes. - 方法會指出指定的序列化的物件是否。The method indicates whether the specified serialized object is a . 您可以新增和移除工具箱項目使用下列方法：You can add and remove toolbox items with the following methods: - 方法會將工具箱 中，以建立如果不存在的 （選擇性） 指定的分類。The method adds a to the toolbox, creating the optionally specified category if it does not exist. - 方法會將，才會啟用工具箱 中目前的專案。The method adds a that is only enabled for the current project to the toolbox. - 方法移除指定。The method removes the specified . - 方法會加入委派能夠將資料儲存在工具箱 上的某些型別轉換。The method adds a delegate capable of converting some type of data stored on the toolbox to a . - 方法會移除任何指定的資料類型的委派。The method removes any delegates for the specified data type. 您可以重新整理工具箱、 標示的工具箱項目使用，或將滑鼠游標設定資料指標，表示目前的工具箱項目使用下列方法：You can refresh the toolbox, mark a toolbox item as used, or set the mouse cursor to a cursor that represents the current toolbox item using the following methods: - 方法會重新整理以反映目前的工具箱項目狀態的 [工具箱] 顯示。The method refreshes the toolbox display to reflect the current state of the toolbox items. - 方法表示工具箱 中，已使用選取的工具箱項目。The method signals the toolbox that the selected toolbox item has been used. - 方法會將滑鼠游標設定資料指標，表示目前的工具箱項目。The method sets the mouse cursor to a cursor that represents the current toolbox item. 您可以使用工具箱 中，序列化或還原序列化的工具箱項目使用下列方法：You can use the toolbox to serialize or deserialize a toolbox item using the following methods: - 方法會嘗試傳回從指定的已序列化的工具箱項目物件。The method attempts to return a from the specified serialized toolbox item object. - 方法會傳回代表指定的序列化的物件。The method returns a serialized object representing the specified . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用在設計模式來列出並選取工具箱分類和項目，並以從 [工具箱] 項目建立元件或控制項，並將其新增。The following code example demonstrates the use of the in design mode to list and select toolbox categories and items, and to create components or controls from toolbox items and add them to a . 若要使用的範例，編譯程式碼組件，並在 Windows Forms 應用程式中新增組件的參考。To use the example, compile the code to an assembly, and add a reference to the assembly in a Windows Forms application. 如果您使用 Visual Studio 中，`IToolboxServiceControl`會自動新增至**工具箱**。If you are using Visual Studio, the `IToolboxServiceControl` is automatically added to the **Toolbox**. 建立的執行個體`IToolboxServiceControl`以測試其行為在表單上。Create an instance of the `IToolboxServiceControl` on a form to test its behavior. [!code-cpp[IToolboxServiceExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxServiceExample1/CPP/itoolboxservicecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IToolboxServiceExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxServiceExample1/CS/itoolboxservicecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IToolboxServiceExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxServiceExample1/VB/itoolboxservicecontrol.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供使用的元件加入"Text"的資料格式處理常式或，至工具箱。The following code example provides a component that uses the to add a "Text" data format handler, or , to the toolbox. 資料的建立者回呼委派會傳遞任何的文字資料貼到工具箱 中，並拖曳到表單上的自訂來建立包含文字。The data creator callback delegate passes any text data pasted to the toolbox and dragged onto a form to a custom that creates a containing the text. [!code-cpp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CPP/textdatatextboxcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CS/textdatatextboxcomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/VB/textdatatextboxcomponent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 加入新的工具箱項目建立者，指定的資料格式。

summary.span: 加入新的工具箱項目建立者，指定的資料格式。

span.span: Adds a new toolbox item creator for a specified data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具箱項目建立者可以將特定的資料格式貼上或到工具箱卸除的資料轉換。A toolbox item creator can convert data of a particular data format that has been pasted or dropped on the toolbox into a . 如果建立者會處理一個以上的格式，呼叫一次以上。If a creator handles more than one format, call more than once. 如果您將新增多個相同的格式建立者，可能會造成非預期的行為。Unexpected behavior may result if you add more than one creator for the same format.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddCreator (System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreatorCallback creator, string format, System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddCreator(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreatorCallback creator, string format, class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host) cil managed
Public Sub AddCreator (creator As ToolboxItemCreatorCallback, format As String, host As IDesignerHost)

summary.span: 加入新的工具箱項目建立者，針對指定的資料格式和設計工具主應用程式。

span.span: Adds a new toolbox item creator for a specified data format and designer host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具箱項目建立者可以將特定的資料格式貼上或到工具箱卸除的資料轉換。A toolbox item creator can convert data of a particular data format that has been pasted or dropped on the toolbox into a . 如果建立者會處理一個以上的格式，呼叫一次以上。If a creator handles more than one format, call more than once. 如果您將新增多個相同的格式建立者，可能會造成非預期的行為。Unexpected behavior may result if you add more than one creator for the same format. 如果`host`參數設為`null`，建立者可用於所有設計工具。If the `host` parameter is set to `null`, the creator will be available to all designers. 如果提供設計工具主應用程式，才會提供給設計工具使用指定的主機建立者。If a designer host is supplied, the creator will only be available to designers using the specified host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回目前所選如果它不是設計工具的特定，且只會傳回目前選取的設計工具專屬中指定的設計工具主應用程式的類型如果`host`參數的型別對應設計工具，在目前選取支援。This method returns the currently selected if it is not designer specific, and only returns a designer-specific currently selected if the type of the designer host specified in the `host` parameter matches the type of designer that the currently selected supports.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 重新整理工具箱項目的狀態。

span.span: Refreshes the state of the toolbox items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來表示工具箱服務使用者想要更新的工具箱項目快取。The method is used to indicate to the toolbox service that the user wants to update the cache of toolbox items. 如果工具箱服務有一份即時的工具箱項目容器，則這個方法會執行任何動作。If the toolbox service maintains a live list of toolbox item containers, then this method will do nothing. 如果它維持 [工具箱] 項目容器的快照集時，呼叫這個方法應該確保是最新的快照集。If it maintains a snapshot of toolbox item containers, calling this method should ensure that the snapshot is up to date.

span.span: Gets a serializable object that represents the specified toolbox item.
An object that represents the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會序列化指定可以保存的物件。This method serializes the specified to an object that can be persisted. 傳回的物件可以儲存在資料流，或傳遞周圍的拖放或剪貼簿作業。The returned object can be stored in a stream or passed around in a drag-and-drop or clipboard operation.

returns.span: 如果資料指標由目前選取的工具，設定如果沒有選取任何工具且游標設定為標準視窗游標。

span.span: if the cursor is set by the currently selected tool, if there is no tool selected and the cursor is set to the standard windows cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有選取工具，資料指標將會預設為標準 Windows 游標。If no tool is selected, the cursor will default to the standard Windows cursor.
